title: sasari
author: sasari
content: I sell amazon.com gift codes ($2000) with 15% discount. We'll use Escrow. payment BTC XMR. PM to agree on terms.

comments.author: Podgor
comments.body: So you say single code is $2000 worth?

comments.author: sandy-is-fine
comments.body: Quote from: sasari on December 13, 2022, 04:30:32 PMI sell amazon.com gift codes ($2000) with 15% discount. We'll use Escrow. payment BTC XMR. PM to agree on terms. I'll bet you a McDonald's Happy Meal that if you add a $2000 (or $1000 or even smaller) Amazon Gift card to your account it will be closed within a couple hours and any order placed will be cancelled. Â  Escrow is meaningless with ANY gift card deal because by the time the account is closed escrow will have been released and the buyer will be SOL.
